svg-for-beginners.title: SVG for Absolute Beginners
svg-for-beginners.subtitle: This is a subtitle
svg-for-beginners.description: In this article, I'll try to go over just enough SVG basics to get you prepared for the fun stuff–namely, animating an SVG icon via JavaScript–we'll get to that by the second article in this series. But first let's tackle those SVG basics…onwards!

svg-intermediate.title: SVG Intermediate: Animating SVG's
svg-intermediate.subtitle: Use Snap.svg to animate your SVG shapes and icons
svg-intermediate.description: In this second article in our SVG series, we start animating SVG shapes and icons via Snap.svg!
